## Testing Checklist

- [ ] I have tested this prompt on at least one AI model
- [ ] The example output is real (not fabricated)
- [ ] I have documented any limitations
- [ ] The prompt doesn't produce harmful content
- [ ] I have searched for similar existing prompts
- [ ] I am willing to make revisions based on feedback
